summary: UPDATED! This is a small house in Whiterun containing all of the crafting stations and unique storage containers.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small house in Whiterun with all of the crafting stations, couple of mannequins and weapon/shield racks, and unique storage containers!
[size=3]
[/size][u][size=3]If updating:[/size]
[/u]1. Take all of your belongings from the house.
2. Go to Bannered Mare, save and exit the game
3. Uninstall the mod, download and install the new version
4. Enjoy!

[u][size=3]Change log:[/size][/u]
v2.0
-Overhauled the interior (see images)
-Added a basement with all crafting stations and coulpe of mannequins and weapon/shield racks
-Added working bookshelfs
-Added more unique storage containers
-Removed clipping grass on the outside

[u][size=3]Credits:[/size][/u]
[size=2]Oaristys and Tony67- Modder's Resource Pack
Eldiabs- racks , bookshelves and mannequins with activators[/size]


[u][size=3]Currently known bugs:[/size]
[/u]Companions won't enter with you into the main cell. After exiting, you have to wait for them to come to you.

Found any bugs? Feel free to report them!
author: kip999
